title: Spack Ruby Issue
body:
RHEL 6.3 when trying to build vim8 using

```
[root@old_server ~]# spack install vim +huge +python +ruby +perl +lua +gui %gcc@6.3.0
```

```
[root@old_server~]# spack install vim +huge +python +ruby +perl +lua +gui %gcc@6.3.0
==> ncurses is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/ncurses-6.0-i6txf2nlsefxdnzlgocrstb5srovups6
==> lua is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/lua-5.3.4-ihc3zpydg6aoqcy2gtozcpikiy53zcpj
==> libffi is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/libffi-3.2.1-jo7273niv7je62vmhw5yw6bzrhkm4hnd
==> zlib is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-7eta3q6r3ozz5vh7zaffgjajf4fwvxby
==> Installing ruby
==> Using cached archive: /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/var/spack/cache/ruby/ruby-2.2.0.tar.gz
==> Already staged ruby-2.2.0-vup3vr3wfw5kjs5plfheeo4mm7lnusb3 in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/var/spack/stage/ruby-2.2.0-vup3vr3wfw5kjs5plfheeo4mm7lnusb3
==> Already patched ruby
==> Building ruby [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'
/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL6/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/ruby/package.py:52, in install:
     45       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     46           options = ["--prefix=%s" % prefix]
     47           if '+openssl' in spec:
     48               options.append("--with-openssl-dir=%s" % spec['openssl'].prefix)
     49           if '+readline' in spec:
     50               options.append("--with-readline-dir=%s" % spec['readline'].prefix)
     51           configure(*options)
  >> 52           make()
     53           make("install")

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-n6ipbE/ruby-2.2.0/spack-build.out

```

generating transdb.h
transdb.h unchanged

verifying static-library libruby-static.a

libruby-static.a(ruby-glommed.o):(.debug_info+0x31058): relocation truncated to fit: R_X86_64_32 against `.debug_str'
